question: Alex hires a luxury car from 3 PM to 7 PM. He gets 1 hour(s) free. The first paid hour is €13 and each hour after that is four times the cost. How much did he pay?
answer:
He got it for 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 hours
He pays for 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 hours
The first hour cost 1*13=€<<1*13=13>>13
The other 3-1=2 hours are more expensive
They cost 13*4=€<<13*4=52>>52 per hour
So those 2 hours cost 2*52=€<<2*52=104>>104
So he pays 104+13=€<<104+13=117>>117 in total
#### 117
